name: Wp Admin Booster
author: ondics.de

sections.description: Wp Admin Booster helps to make the daily WP Administration task a little bit easier.
sections.installation: Download and install the plugin using the standard installation way: Search it in the wordpress plugin list and install with one click.
sections.changelog:
V1.1.3 (2020-12-14)

  • NEW: Default-Button for Cookie bar customization
  • NEW: Textarea for optional admin comments in settings
  • FIX: Cookie bar code fixed (was visible after click on button)

V1.1.2 (2019-01-24)

  • FIX: Updated version history

V1.1.1 (2019-01-24)

  • FIX: Matomo-Code fixed (Comment start missing)

V1.1.0 (2018-11-14)

This update enables GDPR (DSGVO) cookie consent end users.

  • NEW: Cookie bar display in frontend
  • NEW: Cookie bar customzation in backend (color, position, button style)

V1.0.0 (2018-10-12)

  • NEW: Email encryption by shortcode
  • NEW: Matomo/Piwik integration
  • NEW: WordPress tips & tricks
  • NEW: Support contacts

Important:

  • This plugin is available in german language only at the moment.
  • To unlock all features, please request a unlock-key from Ondics.

short_description: Wp Admin Booster helps to make the daily WP Administration task a little bit easier.
